General.Name: Putra Mandiri Jembar Tbk PT
General.Description: PT Putra Mandiri Jembar Tbk, through its subsidiaries, engages in the car dealership business in Indonesia. It also offers vehicle lease and rental, aftermarket, body repair and maintenance, and ecommerce services, as well as spare parts. The company was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Central Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Putra Mandiri Jembar Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Pahalamas Sejahtera.
